name: Frog-is FI-CT4IP
headline: 4.5" Outdoor Waterproof Mounted Speaker
definition: A compact weatherproof coaxial loudspeaker for premium outdoor music and paging.
description: FI-CT4IP is a compact architectural outdoor loudspeaker designed to deliver clean, intelligible sound while remaining visually discreet. Its balanced voicing ensures music and speech remain clear in open-air environments.
story: Engineered for terraces, gardens, and exposed public areas, FI-CT4IP combines weather-ready construction with refined acoustic tuning. Built to perform reliably in challenging outdoor conditions, it delivers consistent coverage and clarity wherever durable sound reinforcement is required.
finish: UV-resistant enclosure with marine-grade metal details
applications: Residential: Poolside entertainment, backyard parties, outdoor home theaters
Commercial: Cafés, hotels, sports arenas, parking garages
Public use: Parks, trails, transit stations, marine docks

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT4IP mounted along a garden wall
lifestyle.caption: Discreet on the surface—confident in coverage.

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT4IP installed on a column in a courtyard
lifestyle.caption: Aimed precisely to keep sound where it belongs.

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT4IP detail showing bracket and enclosure
lifestyle.caption: Clean hardware, built for long-term outdoor duty.

features: Discreet form for façades, columns, and landscape structures
Weatherproof reliability for rain, dust, and sun exposure
High-fidelity voicing for music and intelligible paging
Flexible mounting for precise aiming and clean installs

items.label: Coverage Area
items.value: Up to 500 sq.ft (46 sq.m) per pair

items.label: Mounting
items.value: Wall / Pole / Ceiling brackets, adjustable 0°–180° tilt

name: Frog-is FI-CT6IP
headline: 6.5" Outdoor Waterproof Mounted Speaker
description: A higher-output outdoor loudspeaker with deeper low-end and confident coverage for larger open-air zones.
story: FI-CT6IP keeps the same architectural discipline—clean lines, discreet placement—while scaling performance for terraces, hospitality decks, and public walkways where sound must travel effortlessly.
finish: UV-resistant enclosure with marine-grade metal details
applications: Residential: Poolside entertainment, backyard parties, outdoor home theaters.
Commercial: Cafés, hotels, sports arenas, parking garages.
Public Use: Parks, trails, transit stations, or marine docks.

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT6IP mounted in a landscaped garden
lifestyle.caption: More headroom for wider outdoor zones.

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT6IP on a wall beside a pool area
lifestyle.caption: Stronger bass presence without visual noise.

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT6IP enclosure close-up
lifestyle.caption: Built to stay sharp through seasons and storms.

specs: Coverage Area: Up to 500 sq.ft (46 sq.m) per pair
Frequency Response: 60Hz – 20kHz (±3dB) • Sensitivity: 90dB (1W/1m) • Maximum SPL: 112dB (continuous)
Power: RMS 100W / Peak 200W • Impedance: 8Ω (Ohms) & 70V/100V input voltage
Drivers: 6.5-inch (165mm) woofer • 1-inch (25mm) polymer dome tweeter • Crossover: 3.5kHz (2-way coaxial system)
Build: UV-resistant ABS/polypropylene + marine-grade aluminum alloy • Grille: powder-coated stainless steel / corrosion-resistant mesh • IP Rating: IP65 • UV: MIL-STD-810G
Environment: -30°C to +70°C • Humidity: 0–95% non-condensing
Mounting: Wall/Pole/Ceiling brackets adjustable 0°–180° tilt • Terminals: spring-loaded clips or screw terminals
Dimensions: Diameter 163mm / Depth 239mm • Mounting bracket length up to 500mm • Weight: 2.5kg
features: Bigger 6.5" driver for added body and projection
IP65 protection for long-term outdoor reliability
Wide dispersion for smooth, even outdoor coverage
Flexible bracket aiming for clean commissioning
definition: A high-output weatherproof coaxial loudspeaker for terraces, resorts, and public outdoor areas.

name: Frog-is FI-CT8
headline: 8" Full Range Coaxial Speaker
description: A compact coaxial point source built for near-field accuracy—balanced tone, crisp detail, and controlled coverage.
story: FI-CT8 uses a coaxial architecture to align high and low frequencies on a single axis, improving consistency and intelligibility at close range. An aluminum exponential horn and paper woofer shape a confident, even response for fills, foldback, and compact mains.
finish: Textured black cabinet with steel grille
applications: Lecture hall
Conference room
Fill speakers
Foldback monitor

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT8 used as a compact fill speaker
lifestyle.caption: Focused coverage for intelligible speech and music.

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT8 installed in a lecture space
lifestyle.caption: Even near-field tonality across seating zones.

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT8 angled for foldback monitoring
lifestyle.caption: Precision where performers and presenters need it.

specs: Frequency range: 91 Hz - 20 kHz (-10 dB) • SPL 1W/1mt: 93 (±2) dB
Rated Power: 250W ( AES ) • Rated Impedance: 8 ohms
Maximum sound pressure level (S P L): 116dB (contnuous), 122dB (peak)
Nominal coverage angle (H x V): 80°×80°
Woofer: Ferrite, 1 x 8”woofer/50mm voice coil • Tweeter: Ferrite, 1 x 1" port tweeter/44mm voice coil
Connections: Two professional NL4MP four-core sockets, 1+1-full frequency input • Hanging parts: 10×M8 lifting point, bottom support
Dimension ( W×D×H ): 245×270×320（mm） • Product weight( k g ): 8( kg )
features: Exquisite appearance
Ultra-wide frequency response coverage
Ultra-wide pointing angle
Optimized frequency divider + unit structure to reduce phase interference
definition: A near-field coaxial loudspeaker for refined speech clarity and balanced music reproduction.

name: Frog-is FI-CT8X2
headline: Double 8" Full Range Coaxial Speaker
description: A dual-8 coaxial point source with elevated headroom—more output, same controlled tonal balance.
story: FI-CT8X2 scales the CT concept into a higher-output format, keeping coaxial coherence while extending low-frequency authority. Designed for near-field reinforcement where you need more SPL without losing clarity or coverage control.
finish: Textured black cabinet with steel grille
drivers: 2 x 8" LF drivers + 1" titanium-diaphragm compression driver (coaxial architecture)
applications: Lecture hall
Conference room
Fill speakers
Foldback monitor

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT8X2 used for higher-output fills
lifestyle.caption: More headroom for demanding rooms.

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT8X2 installed in a conference venue
lifestyle.caption: Strong presence without harshness.

lifestyle.alt: FI-CT8X2 deployed as foldback
lifestyle.caption: Confidence on stage and at the lectern.

specs: Frequency range: 65 Hz - 20 kHz (-10 dB) • SPL 1W/1mt: 95 (±2) dB
Rated Power: 350W ( AES ) • Rated Impedance: 4 ohms
Maximum sound pressure level (S P L): 120dB (continuous), 126dB (peak)
Nominal coverage angle (H x V): 80°×80°
Woofer: Ferrite, 2 x 8”woofer/50mm voice coil • Tweeter: Ferrite, 1 x 1" port tweeter/44mm voice coil
Connections: Two professional NL4MP four-core sockets, 1+1-full frequency input • Hanging parts: 10×M8 lifting point, bottom support
Dimension ( W×D×H ): 245 X 270 X 520（mm） • Product weight( k g ): 14( kg )
features: Exquisite appearance
Ultra-wide frequency response coverage
Ultra-wide pointing angle
Optimized frequency divider + unit structure to reduce phase interference
definition: A higher-output dual-8 coaxial loudspeaker for near-field reinforcement and monitoring.

name: Frog-is FB6
headline: Portable Wireless Battery Sound System
description: A battery-powered speaker built for anywhere moments—street, school, sport, garden, or pop-up events—with pro clarity and simple control.
story: FB6 blends portability with real usability: Bluetooth streaming, multiple inputs, DSP control, and lighting—wrapped in a rugged, splash-resistant body. Set it down, pair it, and let the room happen.
drivers: 6.5" woofer + 2 x 2" HF drivers with built-in amplification
applications: Street Performance
Camping music playing
Practice Dancing
Karaoke

lifestyle.alt: FB6 used outdoors for a small gathering
lifestyle.caption: Portable sound with a confident, clean voice.

lifestyle.alt: FB6 used for karaoke and mic input
lifestyle.caption: Built for nights that turn into memories.

lifestyle.alt: FB6 control panel detail
lifestyle.caption: Quick control—no complicated setup.

specs: Frequency range: 40Hz-20Khz • SPL 1W/1mt: 90dB • Maximum SPL: 105dB
Power: 80W • Signal to noise ratio: >= 81dB
Coverage: 120 Horizontal and 90 Vertical
Drivers: High Frequency 2 X 2” driver • Low Frequency 6.5” woofer
Bluetooth: 5.3 version • Reception range: 10 meter
Inputs: 3.5 Line in/Line out; 6.35 Mic Input/6.35 Guitar Input/ USB Audio Input
Power: 15V/5A • Battery life: 10 hours • Battery: Lithium 4000mAh • Standby time: 300 days
Enclosure: Polypropylene • Dimensions: 250x335x280 • Weight: 5kg
Packing: 350x415x325mm • Packing Weight: 6.5kg
features: Flexible features at a great price
Ultra-compact and light weight system delivers excellent sound
Water resistance to splashes and rain
Dazzling lighting effects with RGB light
TWS wireless stereo pairing mode
Multiple audio connections
DSP control for microphone, high frequency and low frequency
definition: A portable battery loudspeaker for events, schools, activations, and everyday music anywhere.

name: Frog-is FP8
headline: Mini Self-Powered Full Range Speaker - 8"
description: A compact active PA that stays punchy and controlled at high levels—ideal for musicians, DJs, and portable systems.
story: FP8 is tuned for tight dynamics and clean projection. Its dual-channel Class D amplification delivers high SPL from a small footprint, with protection and voicing designed for real-world loud stages and fast setups.
finish: Rugged ABS enclosure with integrated handles
applications: Retail stores, restaurants, health clubs, theme parks, educational facilities, hospitality, music cafes, leisure venues
High-output indoor/outdoor foreground/background music and paging

lifestyle.alt: FP8 on a stand in a small venue
lifestyle.caption: Compact size—serious output.

lifestyle.alt: FP8 used as a floor monitor
lifestyle.caption: Fast positioning for stage and rehearsal.

lifestyle.alt: FP8 rear panel
lifestyle.caption: Simple I/O and status indicators for quick checks.

specs: Frequency range: 65 Hz - 20 kHz (± 3 dB) • SPL 1W/1mt: 97 dB • Maximum SPL: 120 dB @ 1 m peak
Coverage: Horizontal 90° • Vertical 70°
Transducers: Low Frequency 8" woofer • High Frequency 1" compression driver, horn loaded
Amplifiers: LF 150 W RMS • HF 50 W RMS • Distortion: < 0.1% THD at rated power • Protection: Thermal, Limiter, Short circuit
Crossover: 2.6 kHz • 24 dB/octave • Speaker Protection: Thermal, Over-excursion
I/O: Input 1 XLR + 1/4" TRS balanced • Output 1 XLR balanced
Power: 100 / 240 ± 10% (50/60 Hz, PFC 95) • Operating range: 125 Vac. / 195 – 250 Vac. (Selectable)
Physical: Stand mount 35 mm • Rigging: 3 points (M8) • Net Weight: 7.8 kg • Dimensions: 27 x 41 x 27 cm
features: High-power 2-way PA for live and playback
Ultra-compact, light, and capable at extreme SPL
Efficient 8" woofer for deep bass and strong projection
Precise 1" compression driver for clear HF detail
Ultra-wide dispersion with protective limiting
definition: An 8" active PA loudspeaker for portable FOH, monitoring, and installed foreground systems.

name: Frog-is FI-M50
headline: High-quality compact studio Monitor
description: A compact near-field monitor designed for truthful translation—clear imaging, tight bass, and low listening fatigue.
story: FI-M50 combines a carefully tuned MDF enclosure with a Class-D amplifier platform and controlled EQ trims, so you can shape response for real rooms and real desks—without losing the integrity of the source.
finish: MDF bass-reflex cabinet with rear port
applications: Audio engineers, Producers and Artists, Music Production

lifestyle.caption: Trim controls for placement and room behavior.

Packing Size: 230x275x365mm • Packing Weight: 6.5kg

Controls: HF -2/-1/0/2Khz above +-1dB • LF -2/-1/0/100Hz below +2dB • Back Volume control

Rear port design for clean, controlled low end
Room Control + High Trim for placement tuning
Inputs and controls suited to studio workflows
